name: Google posts notice of changes, with a 14-day ultimatum.
title: Google posts notice of changes, with a 14-day ultimatum.

tosdr.tldr: Google “will post notice of modifications to these terms on this page. [They] will post notice of modified additional terms in the applicable Service. Changes will not apply retroactively and will become effective no sooner than fourteen days after they are posted.”
